snippet: HEINE--Andrew Noah, passed away peacefully in his home on February 26th at the age of 87. He will be missed dearly by his children Nancy Heine (Madrid, Spain), Priscilla Heine (East Hampton, New York), Jonathan Heine (Los Angeles, California), Adam Heine (Bedford, New York) and Jake Heine (New York City), his daughter and sons- in-law Deborah Heine, Jose Cedillo and Cristobal Majcherski, his six grandchildren Ana, Sara, Tomas, Alejo, Sam and Jessica as well as his three great-grandchildren Diego, Julia and Leo. We will remember and cherish you always for your wry sense of humor and undisputed charm. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HEINE--Andrew Noah, passed away peacefully in his home on February 26th at the age of 87. He will be missed dearly by his children Nancy Heine (Madrid, Spain), Priscilla Heine (East Hampton, New York), Jonathan Heine (Los Angeles, California), Adam Heine (Bedford, New York) and Jake Heine (New York City), his daughter and sons- in-law Deborah Heine, Jose Cedillo and Cristobal Majcherski, his six grandchildren Ana, Sara, Tomas, Alejo, Sam and Jessica as well as his three great-grandchildren Diego, Julia and Leo. We will remember and cherish you always for your wry sense of humor and undisputed charm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HEINE, ANDREW NOAH
